details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.10 Fonts - 6.2.10.8 Use of ActualText
details.description: The ActualText entry shall not contain any PUA values.

rule.description: The ActualText entry shall not contain any PUA values.

error.message: The ActualText entry contains a Private Unicoide Area value
